ANU.name: Ian S. Williams
interest: The micro-scale behaviour of mineral isotopic systems under diverse geological conditions.  The age, origin and thermal history of the Earth’s crust, with a particular emphasis on the early Earth, granite genesis, polymetamorphic terranes and sediment provenance. Palaeoclimate. Instrumentation and techniques for ion microprobe analysis of geological and biological materials.
